lang.word_default:
<#NAME#>,
<#POSTER#> has just posted a comment to an image that you have subscribed to titled "<#CAPTION#>".
The image can be found here: <#BOARD_ADDRESS#>?app=gallery&module=images&img=<#IMG_ID#>
There may be more comments to this image, but only 1 email is sent per board visit for each subscribed image. This is to limit the amount of mail that is sent to your inbox.
Unsubscribing: --------------
You can unsubscribe at any time by logging into your control panel and clicking on the "Image Subscriptions" link.
View only pictures posted in forum
Sorry, but you have reached your total allowable album size
Checking this box will allow other users to view your album.
You did not enter a name for this album
You did not enter a description for this album
The following errors were found, please correct them:
Click here to create your first album!
You do not have any favorite images!
The image has been removed from your favorites list
This image is already in your favorites, sending you back to the image now
If you would like to have your album moved, please contact an administrator.
The image has been added to your favorites, sending you back to the image now
Sorry, but that does not appear to be a valid image. If you arrived at this screen by following a link on this site, please notify a system administrator
You can not move images to this category, it is set to album only
The image is already in the category or album you selected
You left a required field empty, please go back and recheck the form
Your comment has been added, but will have to be approved by a moderator before it appears
You forgot to leave a comment!
Image(s) successfully uploaded, but will have to be approved by a moderator before appearing

-----

Make this the cover image for this album
Unset this image as the cover for this album
Checking this box will allow only your friends to view your album.

This album is a 'container'. This means that you cannot upload directly into it but you can create a new album inside this one.
Checking this box will show your album in the detail mode with larger thumbnails

Landscape mode (for landscape photos with the background in focus)
Action program (biased toward fast shutter speed)
Portrait mode (for closeup photos with the background out of focus)
Creative program (biased toward depth of field)
The 0th row is the visual left-hand side of the image, and the 0th column is the visual bottom
